snippet: COOPER--Henry S.F.,Jr. The family of Henry S.F. Cooper, Jr., invites you to a celebration of his life on Thursday, May 26 at 5pm in New York City. For location, please contact Hannah Cooper at: hlfcooper@gmail.com 1/3
